'''Danny Monroe''' is a childhood friend of [[Ben Warren]].

==History==
Danny's father had a very nice car. Danny and his friends, [[Ben Warren|Ben]] and [[Michael (Indoor Fireworks)|Michael]], decided to take his car for a little joyride. They decided to drive the car quickly and stand in the backseat to get extra thrill. Danny's friends noticed he never let them drive and so never stood in the back himself, so Ben dared him to. However, when he did so, the car crashed and threw him out, causing a head injury that left him in an unconscious state even years later.

==Relationships==
===Friendships===
He, [[Ben Warren]], and [[Michael (Indoor Fireworks)|Michael]] were friends. They took Danny's father's car out for joyrides until a joyride led to Danny sustaining a very serious head injury.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He liked Air Jordans.
